Comment 2: 
I think that we should either fully pin down the exact order of evaluation in all cases,
or we should not worry about this example.  It's hard for me to get worked up about code
that both uses and sets the same variable in the same statement in an obscure way like
this.  I think that even if we do fully pin down the order of evaluation, few people
would be able to figure out what this code does without running it.
